extendedInfo.description: A Brand New App of Desk Pets 2013!Universal controller for Desk Pets products. A universal controller app that works with the iDesk Pets Universal Remote to control Desk Pets products includes: Skitterbot TrekBot Tankbot Carbot BattleTank DriftbotThe basic user guide to use the app is: 1. agree with the terms and conditions 2. read through the user guide if your are the first time to use the app 3. select the product you have on hand 4. Enjoy playing with our toy!! Step by step points to make it work with dongle: 1. un-mute the phone2. Go to "setup" menu at the main page.3. Plug in your dongle, turn it ON.4. turn on the "media volume" at 50% or above.5. Try the "code 1" and "code 2" button, see which code works on your phone.6. if not working, try repeat step 1 to 47. Choose your product from the menu8. press control buttons, you will now see the dongle flashes8. Now it is ready to go. 9. (Optional) Some android phones does have the equalizer apply to the OS and affect the audio output quality. Please make sure to turn it OFF at home -> settings. Also please turn OFF the "Audible Selection" check box.Have fun with Desk Pets!

reviews.title: Poorly written
reviews.comment: The app isnt very well written. One has to start over every time one plays. The bit didnt work more than 2 feet from the remote. Goung back...
reviews.author: Eric Mar

reviews.title: Pathetic download speed
reviews.comment: More than 10mins to dl. not impressed so fat. Why is it a 25mb dl?
reviews.author: Paul Fox

reviews.title: DON\'T BUY
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work at all and is a very poor design the connector will fall off with little use. save some money and buy something else that doesn\'t have the name desk pets on it
reviews.author: bob joe

reviews.title: Unable to get it to work
reviews.comment: After following all instructions, I still can\'t get the Carbot working from my Motorola Droid RAZR. Maybe I\'m doing something wrong, but if it\'s this difficult to setup then it\'s not worth my time. I\'m also not impressed with the range (6 - 10 feet); how much fun will it really be if I need to follow close behind it everywhere it goes?
reviews.author: Don Joslyn

reviews.title: bought at a garage sale for 2.00 not worth that
reviews.comment: Thought to try this thing. what a piece of trash. Tech support absent. App functionality ZERO. save your money and your time this is garbage.
reviews.author: R Schultz

reviews.title: No work
reviews.comment: Does not work at all on my razor max returning carbot. Did everything suggested controller never flashed
reviews.author: Platt Barber

reviews.title: Screen does not rotate
reviews.comment: I like how it works for most devices now, but doesn\'t rotate
reviews.author: Joochan Kim

reviews.title: Bleh
reviews.comment: Does not seem to work with my Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Giovanni Colatori

reviews.title: Battetank issues
reviews.comment: The delay from the application was expected, these aren\'t high end electronics, but my battletanks would get stuck going forwards and backwards and after a few minutes the adapters would stop giving a signal to the toys. I\'m returning them now.
reviews.author: Brandon Zapanas

reviews.title: Dont get this
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work at all and no good settings
reviews.author: Brendan Vine

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: Decent. Pretty fun. If it don\'t work you\'re too stupid to operate it so don\'t bother.
reviews.author: blake torgerson
